title: Samsung Galaxy M21 gets a taste of Android 12 with One UI 4.1 update
content:
After updating its flagship lineup, Samsung has been hard at work rolling out One UI 4.1 to its budget and mid-range smartphones. Earlier this month, the Galaxy A52 4G and Galaxy M62 picked up the stable One UI 4.1 update, followed by the Galaxy A32 5G and Galaxy M31 a week later. The latest to

The post Samsung Galaxy M21 gets a taste of Android 12 with One UI 4.1 update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out the stable One UI 4.1 update based on Android 12 to the Galaxy M21. Read on to know more.
